name: Bug Fables - Aphid Festival
description:
Happy April Fools!

In Bug Fables - Aphid Festival you can raise a cute little Aphid. If they reach level 10, you can try to get an Aphid of a new color!

For offspring, there are three blending modes. Even the same 2 Aphids can result in different colors!

Requires a mouse to be played. You can restart the game by deleting save0.txt and history0.txt
